subject: a perfect spring pop song
body:
thinking of a good last minute birthday present for a friend

my first real PR was merged into the production codebase

the song "[kiss me more](https://open.spotify.com/track/748mdHapucXQri7IAO8yFK)" by doja cat and sza, which i cannot stop listening to, a perfect spring pop song (which is what i want from pop songs year round).

the weather is getting warmer every day

leaving my office door open to let in the breeze
